Cheap riches, or, A pocket-companion made of five hundred proverbial aphorismes &c. as the next ensuinge page will more particularly notifie / by Natthanaell Church. Church, Nathanaell.
[24], 115, [4] p.
Printed by S.G. to be sold at the Beare and Fountain ..., London : 1657.
"Mercurius desideratus" (pp. 103-115) has special t.p. Imperfect: cropped, with print show-through and loss of print. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
